prompt: Professional flat lay photograph capturing a curated collection of 6 diverse antique scissors arranged aesthetically on a piece of aged, dark green velvet fabric, filling the widescreen frame. prompt: Medium shot capturing an antique appraiser's workspace focused on determining scissor value. A pair of sturdy, steel antique tailor's shears lies centered on a worn leather desk blotter. A hand wearing a white cotton glove holds a vintage brass magnifying glass over the maker's mark on the scissors' blade. In the blurred background filling the wide frame are elements like an open antique reference book, a jeweler's loupe, and the warm glow from a banker's lamp. Lighting: Focused task lighting on scissors and magnifier, soft ambient background light. Style: Photorealistic, documentary feel, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9

prompt: Warmly lit still life scene inside an open antique wooden sewing box, filling the landscape view. The scissors are the focal point, slightly off-center. Lighting: Soft, warm directional light, simulating natural window light falling into the box, creating a nostalgic atmosphere. prompt: Sophisticated, gallery-style photograph showcasing a single, exceptionally rare pair of 18th-century gilded steel scissors presented partially within their original red velvet-lined, fitted leather case. To the right, subtly placed and slightly out of focus, is an aged, handwritten provenance tag. The background is a dark, polished surface with soft reflections.
